Scene:
The State Room
(Goten / 御殿)

Play: The Trouble in the Date Household (伽羅先代萩)

Production: September 1972

– Click image to view.

Nozawa Matsunosuke (野澤松之輔)

Tsuruzawa Kanotarō (鶴澤叶太郎)
